content: this hat is knit in a beginner-friendly 1×1 rib and it s got a sleek decrease that keeps the rib pattern intact this hat can be worn cuffed for a fisherman s look or un-cuffed for a slouchy feel with two sizes one for adults and one for babies and toddlers this hat is perfect for the whole family this hat pattern includes a free video tutorial that walks you through the pattern step-by-step this hat uses approximately 150 yards of worsted weight yarn the hats shown are knit with 2 balls of debbie bliss cashmerino aran in burnt orange and 1 hank of cascade yarns 220 merino in sky blue click here for the free pattern & video tutorial 1 1 https //sheepandstitch com/pattern/how-to-knit-a-classic-ribbed-hat-free-pattern-and-video/
